item.title: Cotton to be procured till Dec. 31 in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur Deputy Commissioner Nitish K. has said that the last date for cotton procurement under the minimum support price scheme for 2025-26 through cotton procurement centres in Raichur district is December 31.
Farmers can register their names on the Kapas Kisan mobile application which is available in Google Play Store, providing their details.
They can themselves choose a nearby or any procurement centre, date and time while registering and bring their produce to such a centre for sale, he a...]]>
